titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Department of Political Science, Yale University, Records
Department of Political Science, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:41

did.unittitle: Department of Political Science, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of correspondence, subject files, proposals, personnel records, and student files documenting the activities and operations of the Yale Department of Political Science.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. Department of Political Science

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 14-B (YRG 14-B), Records of academic departments and programs of the Yale Faculty of Arts and Sciences.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is partially restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Department of Political Science, Yale University, Records (RU 409). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence, subject files, proposals, personnel records, and student files documenting the activities and operations of the Yale Department of Political Science.

accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.
